Articles.Content:
For quite a long time I have been searching a mod that adds cameras that give you science when you point it at an object and lets you view the images.

I've seen mods that add cameras, but without giving science, and mods that add telescopes but not simple cameras

Thought that this might be a good idea.

L-Tech Science Industries will do that, I can get science from Hullcam VDS science cameras. This feature at least I can confirm works fine under 1.0.4, along with the radiation sensor which are the only two things I use currently

If they could only add detection for objects so that you don't just get science for being somewhere but also for pointing the camera in the right direction.

But it's a nice mod and I think it'll do for now, thanks
it's supposed to work for anomalies if I remember correctly
